FuncDef: This command specifies the version of IGMP or MLD which is running on this SAP or SDP. This object can be used to configure a router capable of running either value. For IGMP or MLD to function correctly, all routers on a LAN must be configured to run the same version of IGMP or MLD on that LAN.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IGMP or MLD version. Values-1, 2, 3.
